name: QCCompositionParameterView
desc: A class that allows users to edit the input parameters of a composition in real time. The composition can be rendering in any of the following objects: QCRenderer, QCView, or QCCompositionLayer.

items.name: func setCompositionRenderer(QCCompositionRenderer!)
items.desc: Sets the composition parameter view for editing the input parameters of the provided renderer object.

items.name: func compositionRenderer() -> QCCompositionRenderer!
items.desc: Returns the renderer object associated with the composition parameter view.

items.name: func hasParameters() -> Bool
items.desc: Checks whether the composition that is currently edited by the composition parameter view has any input parameters.

items.name: func setDelegate(Any!)
items.desc: Sets the composition parameter view delegate.

items.name: func delegate() -> Any!
items.desc: Returns the composition parameter view delegate.

items.name: func setDrawsBackground(Bool)
items.desc: Sets whether the composition parameter view draws its background.

items.name: func drawsBackground() -> Bool
items.desc: Returns whether the composition parameter view draws its background.

items.name: func setBackgroundColor(NSColor!)
items.desc: Sets the background color of the composition parameter view.

items.name: func backgroundColor() -> NSColor!
items.desc: Retrieves the background color of the composition parameter view.
